Subclasses of GraphicalPanel in panels
 class BackgroundPanel
          The class BackgroundPanel represents the background of the main menu.

          The class DifficultyPanel represents the difficulty menu which extends from the main menu of the game.

          The class MainMenuPanel represents the main menu of the Bomberman game.

          The class HighscorePanel represents the High scores list.

 class MainMenuPanel
          The class MainMenuPanel represents the main menu of the Bomberman game.
